mapper.select: SELECT * FROM DEPARTMENTS ORDER BY DEPARTMENT_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DEPARTMENTS( DEPARTMENT_ID, DEPARTMENT_NAME, MANAGER_ID, LOCATION_ID ) VALUES( #{departmentId}, #{departmentName}, #{managerId}, #{locationId} )
